AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan with five passengers, mentioned in the conversation between United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., described as "riding low"
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: Individuals being transported in vehicles, displaying suspicious behavior such as wearing caps and appearing stiff
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol agent who conducted the initial stop and testified about his observations, including the commonality of encountering illegal aliens wearing caps after walking through brush
